data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Goldstein, Paul Z., Metz, Mark A., Solis, M. Alma (2013): Phylogenetic systematics of Schacontia Dyar with descriptions of eight new species (Lepidoptera, Crambidae). ZooKeys 291: 27-81, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.291.3744, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.291.3744
